description: Provide a scaffold framework to build MCP servers efficiently. Enable rapid development and integration of MCP tools, resources, and prompts with modern TypeScript support. Simplify MCP server setup and management for developers.

capabilities.name: create_webflow_blog_post
capabilities.description: Create a blog post in Webflow. This tool automatically analyzes the blog post content, creates the necessary collection fields if they don't exist, and posts the blog content. No need to specify collection fields - they are generated automatically based on the blog post data.
